doc:
Victor Brooks (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Victor_Brooks_(actor) 0 Victor Brooks (11 November 1918 – 19 January 2000) was a prolific English film and television actor. He specialised in character roles, police inspectors in particular, in British thrillers such as Cover Girl Killer (1959), Witchcraft (1964), and Devils of Darkness (1965). His best known films are probably Goldfinger (1964), The Brides of Dracula (1960) and Billy Budd (1962). On television, he was noted for playing a pipe-smoking authority figure in crime series like Dixon of Dock Green, Gideon's Way, Detective, Z Cars and Crown Court. He also appeared in the television series Raffles, in the recurring role of the Albany porter. Victor_Brooks ( 11_November_1918 – 19_January_2000 ) was a_prolific_English_film_and_television_actor . He specialised in character_roles , police_inspectors in particular , in British_thrillers such_as Cover_Girl_Killer_(_1959_) , Witchcraft_(_1964_) , and Devils of Darkness_(_1965_) . His_best_known_films are probably Goldfinger_(_1964_) , The_Brides of Dracula_(_1960_) and Billy_Budd_(_1962_) . On television , he was_noted for playing a_pipe-smoking_authority_figure in crime_series like Dixon of Dock_Green , Gideon 's_Way , Detective , Z_Cars and Crown_Court . He also appeared in the_television_series_Raffles , in the_recurring_role of the_Albany_porter .
